When he found out about those, he resigned. That was the right thing to do and I always think there's a danger at the moment that he's effectively being punished twice for the same offence. The Prime Minister's backing for Andy Coulson comes just days after the Director of Public Prosecutions ordered a "comprehensive assessment" of all material collected by Scotland Yard linked to the phone hacking scandal.
